adjectives.description: laughterful (comparative more laughterful, superlative most laughterful)

entries.meaning: Full of laughter; indicative of, characterised by, or expressing laughter or mirth.
examples: "I remember once when I was small how he took me by the hand on a frost-clear night, led me forth under the stars, and named for me the pictures in them, Thor's Wain, Freyja's Spindle—how wonderful he made them, how his deep slow laughterful voice filled the dark."
